news.title: Walmart’s Marketplace boom: How lax vetting came with identity theft and fakes
news.summary: A CNBC investigation found lax vetting contributed to fraud and fakes on the site. Walmart’s marketplace is booming, but the strategy poses risks.

news.title: SEC to propose rule change on Trump's call to end quarterly earnings reporting, says Chair Atkins
news.summary: Atkins said if the rule change is approved, it will be left to companies to decide whether they switch to semiannual or stay with quarterly.

news.title: Trump, Xi call on TikTok deal underway
news.summary: U.S. President Donald Trump and Chinese leader Xi Jinping began a much-anticipated call aimed at finalizing a deal to keep TikTok from going dark.

news.title: Fed's Kashkari advocates two more rate cuts this year as he sees limited tariff impact on inflation
news.summary: Minneapolis Federal Reserve President Neel Kashkari spoke Friday on CNBC's "Squawk Box" He said the economy is on the mend and that the economy will continue to grow.

news.title: Treasury, IRS release key details about Trump’s ‘no tax on tips’ deduction
news.summary: The Treasury has issued proposed regulations with more details about Trump’s “no tax on tips” deduction. Here are the key things for workers to know.

news.title: Russell 2000 scored fresh record for the first time in 4 years. Why the small-cap rally still has room to run.
news.summary: Small-cap stocks remain cheap compared with their large-cap peers, say portfolio managers. Despite their recent rally, small-cap stock prices are still cheap, they say.

news.title: ‘Am I the biggest loser with the Fed rate cut?’ I’m 68, retired and live off IRAs and Social Security
news.summary: The Federal Reserve cut policy rates by 25 basis points, to a range of 4% to 4.25%. The Fed pencils in two more reductions this year.

news.title: My mother’s lawyer stole $400K after she moved to a nursing home. How can we get justice?
news.summary: Within a month, her home had fraudulently been put up for sale and her vehicle stolen, police say. “Within a week, her vehicle had been stolen,” police said.

news.title: How a natural-gas deal could boost energy stocks and U.S.-China relations
news.summary: Trump has an opportunity to show he's good at making a deal. Here’s an opportunity for Trump to do what he claims to be good at: making a Deal.

news.title: ‘I want to live in a place that I can enjoy’: I’m 69, single and get $3,000 in Social Security. Can I afford $2,000 rent?
news.summary: “With inheritance, I now have a little over $1 million in cash and investments,” he says. “I’m in a good place.”
